page.title: 10MR DHILLON, TELFORD.
page.content: Mr. Dhillon came to England from the Punjab,India 17 years ago and is married with two children.He is a Sikh. He has lived in Shropshire for 10 years and is a community care worker for Wrekin District Council.He works for three days a week visiting the elderly in the South Shropshire area.Mr. Dhillon is a Justice of the Peace and attends court on one day a week.He has an interesting life and finds that every day is different but meals are usually at the same times each day.His first meal is lunch at about 12 noon.Mr. and Mrs. Dhillon get home at about the same time in the evening - usually between 5.00 and 5.30p.m.They cook the evening meal together and eat at 8p.m.It is usually a traditional Indian meal of curry, chappattis, salad, yoghurt and chutney.
